name: The Dark Portal
description:
Created for the 2023 Boss Rush Game Jam in 28 days.

In this top down bullet-hell shooter, wield a makeshift bow whose durability requires frequent repairs, lest it become flimsy. 

Shop at 3 vendors to repair your bow's durability, purchase different arrow types to fit your playstyle, and consume potions to heal and enhance your combat prowess.

Fight 5 unique bosses that lay waiting within the Dark Portal, with breaks in-between to recuperate and resupply.

NOTE: In the WebGL version several sound effects failed to import. For the best experience, the downloadable version is highly recommended.
